page.title: 20EPPERSTONE P O & STORES
page.content: The Village Shop changed ownership on Monday February llth with the retirement of Mrs M Bladon after years. After alterations to the shop, a sub post office was reopened on the l5th April. The shop sells groceries and provisions, fresh milk and bread. 7 days a week morning papers are delivered by the shop owner and a young boy. The Nottingham Evening Post is delivered to 70 houses six evenings a week by three paper boys. The Post Office Mail van delivers letters and parcels twice a day to the Post office, which is then sorted and delivered by two post ladies.The mail is collected from the post box at 8.l5am and 5.45pm each day. There are no collections or deliveries on Sundays.
